Package com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data

Class Sprites

java.lang.Object
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data.Sprites
public class Sprites extends Object
Contains some sprite-specific functions for loading sprite data and looking up addresses that point to sprites.

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    load(CPUState state)
    Load the sprite data into main memory of the provided CPUState at address 0x0.
    static int
    lookUp(int value)
    Get the address in main memory associated with the provided value.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sprites

      public Sprites()

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static void load(CPUState state)
      Load the sprite data into main memory of the provided CPUState at address 0x0.
      Parameters:
      state - The CPUState into which the sprites will be loaded.

    • lookUp

      public static int lookUp(int value)
      Get the address in main memory associated with the provided value.
      Parameters:
      value - The hex value, from 0x0-0xF, for which to get the address of the associated sprite.
      Returns:
      The address associated with the provided hex value.
